JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities   :       Writing clean, high-quality, high-performance, maintainable code   Develop and support software including applications, database integration, interfaces, and new functionality enhancements   Coordinate cross-functionally to insure project meets business objectives and compliance standards   Support test and deployment of new products and features   Participate in code reviews       Qualifications   :         Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (or related field)   3+ years of relevant work experience   Expertise in Object Oriented Design, Database Design, and XML Schema   Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies   Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work   Familiarity with Kubernetes, Docker and pipeline deployments   Strong fundamentals of Data Structures and Algorithms   Prior experience with any of the frameworks and languages [Go, Python, NodeJS, Kafka]   Open Source contributions are a plus   Strong Analytical Capabilities coupled with a desire to take challenges up
